meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7244.

td.p: Chris Giglio, a Naval officer from Virginia Beach, Virginia
Rebecca Harlow, a lawyer from San Francisco, California
Jill Panall, an H.R. consultant from Newburyport, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,400)

tr.td: THAT TOWN'S IN TEXAS, TOO
CRIME TIME
DRINKING SONGS
SINGLE S, DOUBLE S
PRAYERS
THE MAN UPSTAIRS
